mention.text: jorge luis ochoa vasque , who are reputed to be the brains behind the medellin cartel 's plan to surrender to the government

drug kingpins sole members of ` extraditables ' the 22 january edition of the bogota daily el tiempo published information from colombian police intelligence reports and state security intercepts identifying drug kingpins
extraditables ' the 22 january edition of the bogota daily el tiempo
escobar , pressured by military operations in antioquia
the liaison between the cartel and high level government officials
the kidnappings of alvaro diego montoya , and patricia echevarria and her daughter
the kidnappings of montoya and echevarria
the son of the secretary general of the presidency
traffickers wanted by the united states , but notes
a notice pointing to escobar as the man
a message from other drug traffickers who are unwilling to pay for pablo escobar 's actions
